title: Apple AirTags for bicycle tracking? BikeTaggr mounts attach to your bike for easy tagging
content:
If you follow everything Apple, you already know about their new AirTags. For everyone else, the tiny little device from Apple offers another take on the location tracker. Only, with Apple’s massive network of devices and users, the tracker offers an incredible reach making the AirTag an intriguing way to track just about anything. Including […]

The post Apple AirTags for bicycle tracking? BikeTaggr mounts attach to your bike for easy tagging appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
